name: Danish Ibrahim Khan
desc: An enthusiastic full-stack developer from Maharashtra, India, creating modern, scalable, and real-time web applications that make an impact.
aboutIntro: I’m a Full-Stack Web Developer with over two years of experience building scalable, responsive, and high-performance web applications. My development approach focuses on writing clean, maintainable code and delivering seamless user experiences.
aboutFrontend: On the frontend, I specialize in React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Material-UI to create elegant, component-driven interfaces that work flawlessly across devices. I also have hands-on experience with Next.js for server-side rendering and React Saga for managing complex asynchronous logic in large-scale applications.
aboutBackend: On the backend, I work with Node.js and Express.js to build secure and efficient RESTful APIs. I use Sequelize ORM with MySQL to manage and optimize database operations. I’ve implemented authentication systems using JWT and OAuth 2.0 and developed real-time communication features such as chat and notifications using Socket.io. Additionally, I’ve automated recurring tasks with cron jobs and webhooks.
aboutIntegrations: I’m proficient in integrating third-party services like Razorpay and Stripe for payment processing, and I ensure cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness in every project.
aboutTools: I use tools like Git, GitHub, Jira, and Postman for version control and collaboration, and I deploy applications using Netlify and Azure.
aboutSkills: With a solid foundation in HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript (ES6+), I am confident in delivering full-stack solutions that are both functional and visually appealing.
aboutClosing: I thrive in agile teams and continuously seek opportunities to learn, grow, and contribute to meaningful software projects.

projects.project-desc: Built with React and Tailwind CSS

projectShow.title: CarePulse – Online Healthcare Appointment System
projectShow.description: CarePulse is a healthcare web application designed to simplify the process of scheduling medical appointments. It features a clean and professional interface, allowing patients to book appointments easily using validated personal information. The platform emphasizes accessibility and a seamless user experience for both patients and providers.

projectShow.title: Quotelo – Smart Booking Platform for Meetings & Events
projectShow.description: Quotelo is a French SaaS platform for managing quotes and invoices. I contributed to developing a responsive frontend using React.js and Tailwind CSS, implemented i18n for French localization using next-i18next, and integrated REST APIs for dynamic data handling.

projectShow.title: Sanlam Online – Insurance Claim Camera Module
projectShow.description: Sanlam Online is a digital insurance platform. I built a browser-based camera module allowing users to capture photos and videos with instructions. Ensured cross-browser/mobile support and worked with product/QA teams.

projectShow.title: Fisheries & Aquaculture Management Portal – Govt. of Morocco
projectShow.description: This government platform streamlines fisheries and aquaculture operations. I contributed as a full-stack developer, building responsive UIs with React, integrating secure REST APIs, and managing workflows for legal compliance.

projectShow.title: Amazon Clone – E-commerce Frontend
projectShow.description: A simplified Amazon-like shopping platform built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users can browse products, add to cart, and see dynamic price calculations on the client-side.

projectShow.title: Real-Time Chat App – Socket.IO & Zustand
projectShow.description: A full-stack real-time chat app using React, Zustand, and Socket.IO. Features include instant messaging, typing indicators, emoji support, timestamps, JWT auth, and MySQL backend.

projectShow.title: Memory Game – React & Tailwind Puzzle
projectShow.description: A memory matching game using React and Tailwind. It features a 6x6 grid, Lottie animations, SweetAlert2 feedback, toast notifications, and responsive design.

projectShow.title: Doorstep Bike Service – Mechanic Platform
projectShow.description: Web platform offering bike servicing at doorstep. Supports service packages, mechanic onboarding, franchise inquiry, and a responsive booking workflow.

projectShow.title: Khan Furniture – Custom Furniture & uPVC Solutions
projectShow.description: Khan Furniture showcases modern furniture and uPVC installations. Users can explore sliding windows, doors, calculate pricing, and submit inquiries via a sleek UI.
